name: Death of Sultan Murad
description:
Please play in Chrome browser, otherwise audio won't work.

Death of Sultan Murad is an interactive story where you take the role of a young Serbian knight on his way to a fierce battle.

Explores motives of heroes who sacrificed themselves in order to create a legend.

Made for Ludum Dare 43 "Sacrifices must be made"

LD page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/death-of-sultan-murad
